author: Al Jazeera
title: How are countries in Latin America fighting coronavirus?
description: Across Latin America, countries are announcing new measures as the number of coronavirus infections keeps rising.
content:
Residents in major cities across Latin America will soon be ordered to stay home to try to contain the coronavirus.
In Cuba, with 40 confirmed cases, the government banned citizens from leaving the country, closed schools, and confined thousands of tourists … [+325 chars]
